EmailTemplate.name: Boldchat routing and account number
EmailTemplate.subject: Routing and account information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your email. Idaho Central Credit Unionâ€™s routing number is 324173626. This is also located at the bottom of each page on iccu.com. To access your full account number, you will need to log into your eBranch, select the account, followed by account details. The full account number will be listed there
It has been our pleasure to help. If there is anything else we can do, please do not hesitate to contact us. We appreciate your membership. Have a wonderful day, {!Case.ContactId}!
Thank you,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
{!Case.OwnerTitle}
Idaho Central Credit Union
